summary:
Walk around with the looks of Alice from the game "Alice Madness Returns"
Or maybe you like the Disney version a bit better?
No problem I added a blonde version to the files.
Totally 3 versions. Check them out!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77629-0-1470322243.png[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=3][color=#f4cccc]Did you play the game "Alice Madness Returns"?
Than you probably recognize this Preset! Blackhaired and green eyed beauty!
This mod adds a RaceMenu preset that makes your character look like Alice from the game!

There are three versions of this preset.
1st version has straight hair and looks more like the game version.
2nd version  long wilder hair and the chin is a bit different. 

[b]NEW[/b]
3th version is based of the Disney version from the movie classic "Alice in Wonderland"
Blond hair with ribbon and blue eyes. Face also a bit tweaked.
[/color]
[/size]

[b][font=Georgia][color=#e06666][size=5]Follower mod:[/size][/color][/font][/b]
[color=#f4cccc][size=3][font=Georgia]ThisTimeIBeAGoodGirlSir has made a follower mod!
[/font]You will find it here:
Download, download, DOWNLOAD IT!!
And endorse it :3 !
[/size]
[size=6]====>[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77690/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D77690%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Alice - Standalone Follower[/url] <====
[/size]
[size=3]A follower mod that adds Alice from the game "Alice Madness Returns" 
She has a backstory![/size]

[size=3]Thanks ThisTimeIBeAGoodGirlSir, for this awesome mod![/size][/color]


[b][color=#e06666][size=5]Permission:[/size][/color]
[/b][size=3][color=#f4cccc]For this preset, there is already a followermod in the making.
But you can do that with one of my other presets.
If your are insterested: PM me if you want to make a followermod out of my presets.[/color]
[/size]

[b][color=#e06666][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/color]
[/b][color=#f4cccc][size=3]RaceMenu
KS Hairdos
Fair skin complexion (with all the make-up features)
[size=3]Stroja's Warpaints[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?]http://www.nexusmods...im/mods/60769/?[/url][/size][/color]


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77629-2-1470492248.png[/img]


[color=#e06666][size=5][b]Recommended:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#f4cccc][size=3]XP32 Skeleton Extended[/size]
[size=3]UNP or CBBE bodytype. [/size]
[size=3]Bodyslide[/size][/color]
[b]
[size=5][color=#e06666]Clothing:[/color]
[/size][/b][color=#f4cccc][size=3]I will recommend the Trek Wear clothing.
This looks mostly like a dress Alice would wear. 

VS Trek Wear Dress - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14180385]vicioussarr[/url]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74854/?

Gwelda (Little) Red Riding Hood Outfit - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573]nsk13[/url]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67952/?

[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#f4cccc][size=3]Also, you will find the weapons of Alice Madness returns at Loverslab.
The mod is called "The Weapons Madness Alice v2"

[/size][/color][color=#f4cccc][size=3]I can not put the links here to Loverslab, Nexus won't allow me to do that.[/size]

[/color][b][color=#e06666][size=5]Gameplay:[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#f4cccc][size=3]Past few hours I did some gameplay with the character and it was fun![/size]
[size=3]Here are some tips to make your gameplay more like in the Alice Madness Returns game.[/size]
[size=3]I won't give you all the mods I use for this gameplay, but I will put some links here.[/size][/color]

[b][color=#e06666][size=4]Fist of all: Jumping.[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#f4cccc][size=3]Alice is well known that she can jump very high. So I found a mod that modified the jumping in Skyrim.[/size]
[size=3]Follow the instructions at the modpage. You can fully customize the jumping in Skrim. So now you can do Dubble jump and jump while sprinting.[/size]
[size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65044/?[/size][/color]

[b][color=#e06666][size=4]Shrink Spells[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#f4cccc][size=3]It is a cool idea to use spells that make Alice grow and shrink. However: there are mods that do this, but are in conflict with the RaceMenu plugin that changes your character's height.[/size]
[size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71932/?[/size][/color]
[color=#e06666]
[b][size=4]Perks[/size][/b]
[/color][color=#f4cccc][size=3]Within the vanilla game, there are several things you can use for your character.[/size]
[/color][size=3][color=#f4cccc]So the following perks are important for your Alice build:
Ilusion -[i] Because wonderland :p[/i]
Alternation - [i]Fits for the Shrinking mod and some vanilla spells
[/i]Restoration - [i]Reflecting enemy spells with wards[/i]
One Handed - [i]Alice uses a knife![/i]
Two Handed - [i]Alice uses hammers in the game (Unicorn heads)[/i]
Archery - [i]You can use crossbows. Maybe something like a dwarven rifle?[/i]
Alchemy[i][b] [/b]- for crafting potions ofcourse :p (she drinks a lot)[/i][/color]

[b][color=#e06666]Vanilla Weapons, spells etc.[/color]
[/b][color=#f4cccc]For weapons in game that fits the Alice character, I should go for the following weapons:[/color]
[b]
[color=#e06666]Daggers[/color][/b]
[color=#f4cccc]- Ebony dagger/Blade of sacrifice/Nettlebane[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]- Keening[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]- Dragonpriest Dagger[/color]

[b][color=#e06666]Staffs[/color][/b]
[color=#f4cccc]- Wabbajack[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]- Sanguine's Rose[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]- Skull of corruption[/color]

[b][color=#e06666]Shouts[/color][/b]
[color=#f4cccc]-Whirlwind Sprint[/color]

[b][color=#e06666]Spells[/color][/b]
[color=#f4cccc]- Ward Spells[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]- Clairvoyance[/color]
[color=#f4cccc]- Candlelight
- Muffle
- And more Illusion spells to fit the Wonderland world ;)[/color][/size]


[size=3][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77629-0-1470432054.jpg[/img][/size]

[b][color=#e06666][size=5]I hope you will enjoy the mod![/size][/color]
[/b][color=#f4cccc][size=3]Let me know what you think about this. 
I accept requests for any other female characters from comics or games. Just let me know!
[/size][size=3]Be sure to check out my other mods, if you liked this preset!

[/size][/color][/font][/center]
author: Yourskyrim123

files.name: Alice Madness Returns - RaceMenu Preset Version 2 (rough hair)
Alice Madness Returns - RaceMenu Preset Version 1 (original)
files.fileName: Alice Madness Returns - RaceMenu Preset Version 2-77629-02.zip
